name: GenerateReleaseNotes
description: Generate a Release Notes in Markdown Format
author: Teja Vejendla
instanceNameFormat: Generate Release Notes from Build ID $(FromBuildId) to $(ToBuildId)

inputs.name: ReleaseNotesPath
inputs.label: Release Notes File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The File Path where Release Notes are Generated

inputs.name: ReleaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release Notes File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The File Name where Release Notes are Generated
